index.html.title: Donkey Kong Run Game - Jungle Adventure
index.html.description: Play Donkey Kong Run - a thrilling jungle adventure where you swing, jump, and collect bananas while avoiding obstacles. Perfect fun for all ages!

content..game-description: Join Donkey Kong in this action-packed jungle adventure! Swing from vine to vine, dodge dangerous obstacles, and collect as many bananas as possible while avoiding the dangers of the jungle.

how-to-play.html.title: How to Play - Donkey Kong Run Game
how-to-play.html.description: Learn how to play Donkey Kong Run with our comprehensive guide. Master the controls, discover tips, and conquer the jungle levels.

content..page-header p: Master the controls and conquer the jungle levels in Donkey Kong Run

news.html.title: News - Donkey Kong Run Game
news.html.description: Latest news and updates about Donkey Kong Run - stay informed about new features, events, and game improvements.

content..page-header p: Stay updated with the latest developments and announcements for Donkey Kong Run Game

contacts.html.title: Contact Us - Donkey Kong Run Game
contacts.html.description: Contact the Donkey Kong Run team for support, feedback, or business inquiries. We're here to help!

content..page-header p: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you!
